name: ClarisDraw Drawing
summary: Learn about .DDRW files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: ClarisDraw was developed for Mac OS Classic and is not supported on Mac OS X. However, DDRW files may be opened in Mac OS X using the EazyDraw application.

description: Drawing created by ClarisDraw, an older vector graphics editing program for the Macintosh; may contain vector-based shapes, text, and image effects; used for logos, banners, or other graphics that need to be resized without losing image quality.
